Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of prisoners released from federal prison during the Obama administration.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the statement about the number of prisoners released.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that releasing prisoners from federal prison during the Obama administration is relevant to the topic being discussed (response to the COVID-19 pandemic).
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or factors to consider when evaluating the impact of releasing prisoners from federal prison during the Obama administration on the current situation.
